description:
expectation of the operating time to first failure.
Note 1 See also operating time to first failure (192-05-02). 

Note 2 For non-repairable items, the MTTFF is also the MTTF. 

Note 3 Term 'mean' is used as synonym  to the term arithmetic mean.

name.defaultValue: mean operating time to first failure

i18nValue.en_US: mean operating time to first failure
